greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 8^n - 7^n.
comment: These are the numerators of a(n) = Integral_{x=0..1/4} (1-x/2)^n dx. E.g., a(3)=1695/8192. The denominators are b(3) = 4*(n+1)*8^n. b(n)=8192. The subscript in both cases is 0. - Al Hakanson (hawkuu(AT)excite.com), Feb 22 2004
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (15, -56).
formula: E.g.f.: e^(8*x) - e^(7*x). - _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jan 14 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
